content: this pattern works just as well in a solid colour and will work well in any weight of yarn - just follow the manufacturer s guide for which size hook to use and you re good to go **this pattern is written in uk terms ** difficulty rating easy if you can make a granny square you ll be fine abbreviations used chain = chain treble_crochet = treble_crochet yo = yarn over st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch double_crochet = double_crochet
